mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_lendrecord (user_id, book_id, category, rent_time, return_time, bookname, status) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{book_id}, #{category}, NOW(), DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY), #{bookname}, 1)
mapper.select: select sum(status) as statusSum from t_lendrecord where user_id = #{user_id}
select book_id from t_lendrecord where id = #{id}
select * from t_lendrecord where user_id = #{userId} and status = 1 and NOW() > return_time
select * from t_lendrecord where user_id = #{userId} and status = 1 and DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 DAY) > return_time
